name: Duo Defenders - Tower Defense
description:
Tower Defense from a place down under. Play as Sally the Platypus and Koko the Koala in this cute, lighthearted cooperative tower defense game! Work together to reload the towers with different ammunition to fend off foes. Try your best to hit enemies with their respective colors for optimal effect.

This one is perfect with a partner, so invite your best friends, lover or enemies to play with!

Controls:

Koko
Movement - Arrow Keys
Action - Enter

Sally
Movement - WASD
Action - Space
